@Tatemo wrote:

Dear god this is so fucking terrible.

Get some conventions and create some methods/handlers before I rip out your eyes and chop off your hands.

item.title: [317 - 100% construction CONTINUED [317]
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

Construction is

[ul][li]Tools[/li]
[li]Requirements[/li]
[li]Building Objects[/li]
[li]Loading room hotspot for room building[/li]
[li]Loading object hotspots for object building in room[/li]
[li]A flat green map[/li]
[li]A flat dark brown map[/li]
[li]Separate houses for each player (1 house for every 4 height levels.)[/li]
[li]Entering other players houses[/li]
[li]Unable to enter the house if the player is not there.[/li][/ul]

And some more I can’t think of at the moment. Reading this tutorial, you don’t have all that.

Read full topic

item.title: [317 - 100% construction CONTINUED [317]
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Great but could use each player having his own world like you said!

What you can do is make it so each new item the player adds it adds a new line in the character file, then loads the items from that list. Then make it so when you click on the portal, it asks you for a player’s name and then you teleport to The house area, but it loads his stuff.

Might be worked on but this is what i can currently think of…

Read full topic

item.title: [317 - 100% construction CONTINUED [317]
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Part 2 - Making

In client.java search for

public void refreshSkills() {

Underneath this, anywhere you like, put the following:

sendQuest("@gre@Construction Level: "+ playerLevel[21] +"", 7340); sendQuest("@whi@Cons Exp:" + playerXP[21] + "", 7346);

This will basically put your players Construction Level and experience in the quest tab, making it easier for you to see it. Unless, ofcourse you have a client with the Construction and Hunter levels already in the skills tab, in that case don’t bother with the above.

Okay, now search for:

public void NewObjects() {

Underneath this, anywhere you like put the following code:

//workshop poh - west makeGlobalObject(2102, 3181, 2066, 2, 10); makeGlobalObject(2101, 3181, 2066, 2, 10); makeGlobalObject(2100, 3181, 2066, 2, 10); makeGlobalObject(2099, 3181, 2066, 2, 10); makeGlobalObject(2098, 3181, 2066, 2, 10); makeGlobalObject(2097, 3181, 2066, 2, 10); makeGlobalObject(2096, 3181, 2066, 2, 10); makeGlobalObject(2095, 3181, 2066, 2, 10); makeGlobalObject(2094, 3181, 2066, 2, 10); makeGlobalObject(2093, 3181, 2066, 2, 10); makeGlobalObject(2092, 3181, 2066, 2, 10); makeGlobalObject(2091, 3181, 2066, 2, 10); makeGlobalObject(2090, 3181, 2066, 2, 10); makeGlobalObject(2089, 3181, 2066, 2, 10); makeGlobalObject(2088, 3181, 2066, 2, 10); makeGlobalObject(2087, 3181, 2066, 2, 10); makeGlobalObject(2086, 3181, 2066, 2, 10); makeGlobalObject(2085, 3181, 2066, 2, 10); makeGlobalObject(2084, 3181, 2066, 2, 10); //workshop poh - south makeGlobalObject(2084, 3180, 2066, 1, 10); makeGlobalObject(2084, 3179, 2066, 1, 10); makeGlobalObject(2084, 3178, 2066, 1, 10); makeGlobalObject(2084, 3177, 2066, 1, 10); makeGlobalObject(2084, 3176, 2066, 1, 10); makeGlobalObject(2084, 3175, 2066, 1, 10); makeGlobalObject(2084, 3174, 2066, 1, 10); makeGlobalObject(2084, 3173, 2066, 1, 10); makeGlobalObject(2084, 3172, 2066, 1, 10); makeGlobalObject(2084, 3171, 2066, 1, 10); makeGlobalObject(2084, 3170, 2066, 1, 10); makeGlobalObject(2084, 3169, 2066, 1, 10); //workshop poh - east makeGlobalObject(2102, 3169, 2066, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2101, 3169, 2066, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2100, 3169, 2066, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2099, 3169, 2066, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2098, 3169, 2066, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2097, 3169, 2066, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2096, 3169, 2066, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2095, 3169, 2066, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2094, 3169, 2066, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2093, 3169, 2066, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2092, 3169, 2066, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2091, 3169, 2066, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2090, 3169, 2066, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2089, 3169, 2066, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2088, 3169, 2066, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2087, 3169, 2066, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2086, 3169, 2066, 0, 10); makeGlobalObject(2085, 3169, 2066, 0, 10); //workshop poh - north makeGlobalObject(2102, 3180, 2066, 3, 10); makeGlobalObject(2102, 3179, 2066, 3, 10); makeGlobalObject(2102, 3178, 2066, 3, 10); makeGlobalObject(2102, 3177, 2066, 3, 10); makeGlobalObject(2102, 3176, 2066, 3, 10); makeGlobalObject(2102, 3175, 2066, 3, 10); makeGlobalObject(2102, 3174, 2066, 3, 10); makeGlobalObject(2102, 3173, 2066, 3, 10); makeGlobalObject(2102, 3172, 2066, 3, 10); makeGlobalObject(2102, 3171, 2066, 3, 10); makeGlobalObject(2102, 3170, 2066, 3, 10);

This is making your Player-Owned-Houses walls, for a boundary when your in your house.

Now, before the next bit, this bit is VERY IMPORTANT as it is what creates the players-house area.

Okay, in client.java search for:

public boolean isInPitRoom() {

You should see some code a bit like this:

public boolean isInPitRoom() { if((absX >= 2394 && absX <= 2408 && absY >= 5168 && absY <=5175)) return true; else return false; }

Now, underneath that put the following and make sure it is exactly like the folllowing:

public boolean isInShop() { return absX <= 2102 && absX >= 2084 && absY >= 3169 && absY <=3181; }

Okay, this will be explained later but it is basically the Workshop-where your player can train construction!!

Now, minimise Client.java and open your Texthandler.java
Your client may already have the following code in the texthandler.java, if so, just paste this in then delete the duplicates. The following code is what will appear in the quest tab, that a player can work from. It is important that, unless you know what your doing, you keep the , XXXX); at the end of each sendquest in there. Heres the code you need to paste in:

//construction! if(c.q4 == 0){ c.sendQuest("@yel@Construction", 7335); } if(c.q3 > 0){ c.sendQuest("@yel@Construction", 7335); } if(c.q3 == 15){ c.sendQuest("@yel@Construction", 7335); } if(c.q4 == 0){ c.sendQuest("@gre@Chair (Level 1)", 7344); } if(c.q3 > 0){ c.sendQuest("@gre@Chair (Level 1)", 7344); } if(c.q3 == 15){ c.sendQuest("@gre@Chair (Level 1)", 7344); } if(c.q16 == 0){ c.sendQuest("@gre@Larder (Level 15)", 7345); } if(c.q16 > 0){ c.sendQuest("@gre@Larder (Level 15)", 7345); } if(c.q16 == 15){ c.sendQuest("@gre@Larder (Level 15)", 7345); } if(c.q16 == 0){ c.sendQuest("@gre@Bush (Level 30)", 7347); } if(c.q16 > 0){ c.sendQuest("@gre@Bush (Level 30)", 7347); } if(c.q16 == 15){ c.sendQuest("@gre@Bush (Level 30)", 7347); } if(c.q16 == 0){ c.sendQuest("@gre@Fountain (Level 40)", 7348); } if(c.q16 > 0){ c.sendQuest("@gre@Fountain (Level 40)", 7348); } if(c.q16 == 15){ c.sendQuest("@gre@Fountain (Level 40)", 7348); } c.sendQuest("HIGH LEVEL ITEMS", 682); c.sendQuest("@gre@Pond (Level 60)", 12772);//q19 c.sendQuest("@gre@Altar (Level 70)", 673);//q20 c.sendQuest("@gre@Fence (Level 80)", 7352);//q21 c.sendQuest("@gre@Table (Level 90)", 17510);//q22 c.sendQuest("@gre@Bed (Level 92)", 7353);//q23 c.sendQuest("@gre@Armour (Level 95)", 12129);//q24 c.sendQuest("@gre@Tree's (level 99)", 8438);//q25 c.sendQuest("@gre@Thrones (Level 99)", 12852);//q26 c.sendQuest("@gre@Dungeon (Level 50)", 15841);//q27

Okay, more sense will be made out of these later but for now just save and close texthandler.java

Now, open up Clicking.java and search for:

switch(c.actionButtonId) {

After this, paste the following in, i will explain bits of it at the end of this code:

case 28176: if(c.playerHasItem(995, 500000) && c.playerHasItem(2347, 1) && c.playerHasItem(7121, 3) && c.isInShop()){ c.deleteItem(995, 500000); c.deleteItem(7121, 1); c.deleteItem(7121, 1); c.deleteItem(7121, 1); c.makeGlobalObject(c.absX,c.absY, 1088, 0, 10); c.addSkillXP(5000, 21); c.sM("You make a chair!"); } else { c.sM("You need a hammer, 500k coins and 3 repair planks!"); c.sM("You also need to be in the workshop"); c.sM("Teleport there by going to the Construction Teleport tab"); } break; case 28177: if(c.playerHasItem(995, 1000000) && c.playerHasItem(2347, 1) && c.playerHasItem(7121, 6) && c.playerLevel[21] >= 15 && c.isInShop()){ c.deleteItem(995, 1000000); c.deleteItem(7121, 1); c.deleteItem(7121, 1); c.deleteItem(7121, 1); c.deleteItem(7121, 1); c.deleteItem(7121, 1); c.deleteItem(7121, 1); c.makeGlobalObject(c.absX,c.absY, 13565, 0, 10); c.addSkillXP(7645, 21); c.sM("You make a Larder!"); } else { c.sM("You need a hammer, 1000k coins, 15 Construction and 6 repair planks!"); c.sM("You also need to be in the workshop"); c.sM("Teleport there by going to the Construction Teleport tab"); } break; case 28179: if(c.playerHasItem(995, 700000) && c.playerHasItem(2347, 1) && c.playerLevel[21] >= 30 && c.isInShop()){ c.deleteItem(995, 700000); 
		c.makeGlobalObject(c.absX,c.absY, 1118, 0, 10);
		
		c.sM("You make a Bush!");
		}
		else
		{
		c.sM("You need a hammer, 700k coins and 30 Construction!");
		c.sM("You also need to be in the workshop");
		c.sM("Teleport there by going to the Construction Teleport tab");
		}
		break;	
	case 28180:
		if(c.playerHasItem(995, 1500000) && c.playerHasItem(2347, 1) && c.playerHasItem(3420, 6) && c.playerLevel[21] >= 40 && c.isInShop()){
		c.deleteItem(995, 1500000);
		c.deleteItem(3420, 1);
		c.deleteItem(3420, 1);
		c.deleteItem(3420, 1);
		c.deleteItem(3420, 1);
		c.deleteItem(3420, 1);
		c.deleteItem(3420, 1);
		c.makeGlobalObject(c.absX,c.absY, 153, 0, 10);
		c.addSkillXP(12500, 21);
		c.sM("You make a Fountain!");
		}
		else
		{
		c.sM("You need a hammer, 1500k coins, 40 Construction and 6 Limestone Bricks!");
		c.sM("You also need to be in the workshop");
		c.sM("Teleport there by going to the Construction Teleport tab");
		}
		break;
	case 49228:
		if(c.playerHasItem(995, 2500000) && c.playerHasItem(2347, 1) && c.playerHasItem(3420, 10) && c.playerLevel[21] >= 60 && c.isInShop()){
		c.deleteItem(995, 2500000);
		c.deleteItem(3420, 1);
		c.deleteItem(3420, 1);
		c.deleteItem(3420, 1);
		c.deleteItem(3420, 1);
		c.deleteItem(3420, 1);
		c.deleteItem(3420, 1);
		c.deleteItem(3420, 1);
		c.deleteItem(3420, 1);
		c.deleteItem(3420, 1);
		c.deleteItem(3420, 1);
		c.makeGlobalObject(c.absX,c.absY, 13407, 0, 10);
		c.addSkillXP(15642, 21);
		c.sM("You make a Pond!");
		}
		else
		{
		c.sM("You need a hammer, 2500k coins, 60 Construction and 10 Limestone Bricks!");
		c.sM("You also need to be in the workshop");
		c.sM("Teleport there by going to the Construction Teleport tab");
		}
		break;
	case 2161:
		if(c.playerHasItem(995, 1500000) && c.playerHasItem(2347, 1) && c.playerHasItem(7121, 5) && c.playerHasItem(3420, 10) && c.playerLevel[21] >= 70 && c.isInShop()){
		c.deleteItem(995, 1500000);
		c.deleteItem(3420, 1);
		c.deleteItem(3420, 1);
		c.deleteItem(3420, 1);
		c.deleteItem(3420, 1);
		c.deleteItem(3420, 1);
		c.deleteItem(3420, 1);
		c.deleteItem(3420, 1);
		c.deleteItem(3420, 1);
		c.deleteItem(3420, 1);
		c.deleteItem(3420, 1);
		c.deleteItem(7121, 1);
		c.deleteItem(7121, 1);
		c.deleteItem(7121, 1);
		c.deleteItem(7121, 1);
		c.deleteItem(7121, 1);
		c.makeGlobalObject(c.absX,c.absY, 409, 0, 10);
		c.addSkillXP(12450, 21);
		c.sM("You make an Altar!");
		}
		else
		{
		c.sM("You need a hammer, 1500k coins, 70 Construction, 10 Limestone Bricks and 5 Repair Planks!");
		c.sM("You also need to be in the workshop");
		c.sM("Teleport there by going to the Construction Teleport tab");
		}
		break;
	case 28184:
		if(c.playerHasItem(995, 500000) && c.playerHasItem(2347, 1) && c.playerHasItem(7121, 10) && c.playerLevel[21] >= 80 && c.isInShop()){
		c.deleteItem(995, 500000);
		c.deleteItem(7121, 1);
		c.deleteItem(7121, 1);
		c.deleteItem(7121, 1);
		c.deleteItem(7121, 1);
		c.deleteItem(7121, 1);
		c.deleteItem(7121, 1);
		c.deleteItem(7121, 1);
		c.deleteItem(7121, 1);
		c.deleteItem(7121, 1);
		c.deleteItem(7121, 1);
		c.makeGlobalObject(c.absX,c.absY, 2068, 0, 10);
		c.addSkillXP(15642, 21);
		c.sM("You make a Fence!");
		}
		else
		{
		c.sM("You need a hammer, 500k coins, 80 Construction and 10 Repair Planks!");
		c.sM("You also need to be in the workshop");
		c.sM("Teleport there by going to the Construction Teleport tab");
		}
		break;
	case 68102:
		if(c.playerHasItem(995, 2500000) && c.playerHasItem(2347, 1) && c.playerHasItem(7121, 10) && c.playerLevel[21] >= 90 && c.isInShop()){
		c.deleteItem(995, 2500000);
		c.deleteItem(7121, 1);
		c.deleteItem(7121, 1);
		c.deleteItem(7121, 1);
		c.deleteItem(7121, 1);
		c.deleteItem(7121, 1);
		c.deleteItem(7121, 1);
		c.deleteItem(7121, 1);
		c.deleteItem(7121, 1);
		c.deleteItem(7121, 1);
		c.deleteItem(7121, 1);
		c.makeGlobalObject(c.absX,c.absY, 593, 0, 10);
		c.addSkillXP(17421, 21);
		c.sM("You make a Table!");
		}
		else
		{
		c.sM("You need a hammer, 2500k coins, 90 Construction and 10 Repair Planks!");
		c.sM("You also need to be in the workshop");
		c.sM("Teleport there by going to the Construction Teleport tab");
		}
		break;
	case 28185:
		if(c.playerHasItem(995, 2500000) && c.playerHasItem(2347, 1) && c.playerHasItem(7121, 10) && c.playerHasItem(3224, 2) && c.playerLevel[21] >= 92 && c.isInShop()){
		c.deleteItem(995, 2500000);
		c.deleteItem(7121, 1);
		c.deleteItem(7121, 1);
		c.deleteItem(7121, 1);
		c.deleteItem(7121, 1);
		c.deleteItem(7121, 1);
		c.deleteItem(7121, 1);
		c.deleteItem(7121, 1);
		c.deleteItem(7121, 1);
		c.deleteItem(7121, 1);
		c.deleteItem(7121, 1);
		c.deleteItem(3224, 1);
		c.deleteItem(3224, 1);
		c.makeGlobalObject(c.absX,c.absY, 4792, 0, 10);
		c.addSkillXP(23166, 21);
		c.sM("You make a Bed!");
		}
		else
		{
		c.sM("You need a hammer, 2500k coins, 92 Construction, 10 Repair Planks and 2 Cloths!");
		c.sM("You also need to be in the workshop");
		c.sM("Teleport there by going to the Construction Teleport tab");
		}
		break;
	case 47097:
		if(c.playerHasItem(995, 2500000) && c.playerHasItem(2347, 1) && c.playerHasItem(7121, 10) && c.playerLevel[21] >= 95 && c.isInShop()){
		c.deleteItem(995, 2500000);
		c.deleteItem(7121, 1);
		c.deleteItem(7121, 1);
		c.deleteItem(7121, 1);
		c.deleteItem(7121, 1);
		c.deleteItem(7121, 1);
		c.deleteItem(7121, 1);
		c.deleteItem(7121, 1);
		c.deleteItem(7121, 1);
		c.deleteItem(7121, 1);
		c.deleteItem(7121, 1);
		c.makeGlobalObject(c.absX,c.absY, 13496, 0, 10);
		c.addSkillXP(17421, 21);
		c.sM("You make an Armour Stand!");
		}
		else
		{
		c.sM("You need a hammer, 2500k coins, 95 Construction and 10 Repair Planks!");
		c.sM("You also need to be in the workshop");
		c.sM("Teleport there by going to the Construction Teleport tab");
		}
		break;
	case 32246:
		if(c.playerHasItem(995, 25000) && c.playerHasItem(2347, 1) && c.playerLevel[21] >= 99 && c.isInShop()){
		c.deleteItem(995, 25000);
		c.makeGlobalObject(c.absX,c.absY, 1310, 0, 10);
		
		c.sM("You make a Tree!");
		}
		else
		{
		c.sM("You need a hammer, 25k coins and 99 Construction!");
		c.sM("You also need to be in the workshop");
		c.sM("Teleport there by going to the Construction Teleport tab");
		}
		break;	
	case 50052:
		if(c.playerHasItem(995, 60000000) && c.playerHasItem(2347, 1) && c.playerLevel[21] >= 99 && c.isInShop()){
		c.deleteItem(995, 60000000);
		c.makeGlobalObject(c.absX,c.absY, 12092, 0, 10);
		
		c.sM("You make a Throne - Fit for a king!!");
		}
		else
		{
		c.sM("You need a hammer, 60M coins and 99 Construction!");
		c.sM("You also need to be in the workshop");
		c.sM("Teleport there by going to the Construction Teleport tab");
		}
		break;
	case 61225:
		if(c.playerHasItem(995, 600000) && c.playerHasItem(2347, 1) && c.playerLevel[21] >= 50 && c.isInShop()){
		c.deleteItem(995, 600000);
		c.makeGlobalObject(c.absX,c.absY, 13409, 0, 10);
		
		c.sM("You make a Dungeon Entrance!!");
		}
		else
		{
		c.sM("You need a hammer, 600K coins and 50 Construction!");
		c.sM("You also need to be in the workshop");
		c.sM("Teleport there by going to the Construction Teleport tab");
		}
		break;</blockquote>

Okay first off you will notice the following code at the end of the if statements:

c.isInShop()){

This is why the code from before (the public boolean isInShop) was so important!
Okay, this is basically saying that if the player is in the Workshop (or POH) then they can build those objects.

You may also notice there is a Dungeon Entrance, I made a Dungeon on my server but im going to let you all figure out how to make your own because i would like to keep mine to my own server :).

Accessing your POH

Okay, to access your POH i created a portal but there are many other ways of getting there. I am just going to include the portal.

Okay, in client.java search for this:

public void NewObjects() {

Underneath that put the following code:

makeGlobalObject(XXXX, YYYY, 13405, 2, 10);

Okay, change the XXXX and the YYYY to the co-ords you would like then save it but DO NOT CLOSE!
now search for this:

if (objectID == 6552) {

You should see something a bit like this:

if (objectID == 6552) { if (q3 != 15 && playerAncientMagics == 0){ sM("You must complete Desert Treasure if you want to use Ancients."); } if (playerAncientMagics == 1) { setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); // magic tab (ancient = 12855); // /normal = 1151 playerAncientMagics = 0; sM("You convert to normal magic!"); } else if (playerAncientMagics == 0 && q3 == 15) { setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); // magic tab (ancient = 12855); playerAncientMagics = 1; sM("You convert to ancient magicks!"); } }

Now, underneath that put this:

if(objectID == 13405){ toX = 2099; toY = 3177; sM("You teleport to your POH!");

}

Okay, once you have done that your done with the basics! If you want to change what the player makes the you can change around the

c.makeglobalObject(XXXX, YYYY, OBJID, 0, 10);

Also, if anyone could comment below and tell me how to permanently spawn the objects and give players their own house then i would appreciate it alot!

I hope this helps at least a little bit!!
Please, no flaming this was created 98% by me and 1% usman555 and 1% deathchaos - for pointing me in the right direction!
Thanks for reading!

Read full topic
